NAME.label: Name
NAME.tooltip: Display name for the element (shown in UI, used by g_isolated_print_box)

BOX_SIZE_XYZ.label: Box Size
BOX_SIZE_XYZ.tooltip: Box outer dimensions [width, depth, height] in mm. Note: inset-lid boxes are taller by 2x wall thickness.

BOX_FEATURE.label: Feature
BOX_FEATURE.tooltip: Feature — defines one set of compartments inside the box

TRAY.label: Tray
TRAY.tooltip: Tray — one physical tray in the counter tray set

BOX_LID.label: Lid
BOX_LID.tooltip: Lid parameters — controls lid style, pattern, and labels

BOX_NO_LID_B.label: No Lid
BOX_NO_LID_B.tooltip: If checked, no lid is generated and no inset lip is formed

BOX_STACKABLE_B.label: Stackable
BOX_STACKABLE_B.tooltip: If checked, box base is cut to stack on identical boxes (requires 45 degree overhang capability)

BOX_WALL_THICKNESS.label: Wall Thickness
BOX_WALL_THICKNESS.tooltip: Wall thickness in mm (overrides the global g_wall_thickness)

ENABLED_B.label: Enabled
ENABLED_B.tooltip: Uncheck to skip this item without deleting it

_DEBUG_B.label: Debug
_DEBUG_B.tooltip: Highlight this item's geometry in transparent red (OpenSCAD # modifier) for debugging

LABEL.label: Label
LABEL.tooltip: Label block — add text or images to surfaces

ROTATION.label: Rotation
ROTATION.tooltip: Rotation in degrees around the Z axis

POSITION_XY.label: Position
POSITION_XY.tooltip: Position offset [x, y]. Use numbers for absolute mm, or CENTER / MAX for alignment.

FTR_COMPARTMENT_SIZE_XYZ.label: Compartment Size
FTR_COMPARTMENT_SIZE_XYZ.tooltip: Interior size of each compartment [width, depth, height] in mm

FTR_NUM_COMPARTMENTS_XY.label: Grid Count
FTR_NUM_COMPARTMENTS_XY.tooltip: Grid layout [columns, rows] — how many compartments in each direction

FTR_SHAPE_ROTATED_B.label: Shape Rotated
FTR_SHAPE_ROTATED_B.tooltip: Rotate the compartment shape 90 degrees around the Z axis

FTR_SHAPE_VERTICAL_B.label: Shape Vertical
FTR_SHAPE_VERTICAL_B.tooltip: Orient shape for vertical piece stacks (extrude sideways instead of up)

FTR_PADDING_XY.label: Padding
FTR_PADDING_XY.tooltip: Spacing between adjacent compartments [x, y] in mm

FTR_PADDING_HEIGHT_ADJUST_XY.label: Padding Height Adj.
FTR_PADDING_HEIGHT_ADJUST_XY.tooltip: Height adjustment for padding walls [x, y] — typically negative values

FTR_MARGIN_FBLR.label: Margin
FTR_MARGIN_FBLR.tooltip: Extra margin around the component [front, back, left, right] in mm

FTR_CUTOUT_SIDES_4B.label: Cutout Sides
FTR_CUTOUT_SIDES_4B.tooltip: Add finger cutouts on sides [front, back, left, right]

FTR_CUTOUT_CORNERS_4B.label: Cutout Corners
FTR_CUTOUT_CORNERS_4B.tooltip: Add corner cutouts [front-left, back-right, back-left, front-right]

FTR_CUTOUT_HEIGHT_PCT.label: Cutout Height %
FTR_CUTOUT_HEIGHT_PCT.tooltip: Cutout height as % of compartment height (from top). Default: 100

FTR_CUTOUT_DEPTH_PCT.label: Cutout Depth %
FTR_CUTOUT_DEPTH_PCT.tooltip: Cutout depth as % of compartment depth (into base). Default: 25

FTR_CUTOUT_WIDTH_PCT.label: Cutout Width %
FTR_CUTOUT_WIDTH_PCT.tooltip: Cutout width as % of compartment width. Default: 50

FTR_CUTOUT_BOTTOM_B.label: Bottom Cutout
FTR_CUTOUT_BOTTOM_B.tooltip: Add a bottom cutout for pushing pieces out from below

FTR_CUTOUT_BOTTOM_PCT.label: Bottom Cutout %
FTR_CUTOUT_BOTTOM_PCT.tooltip: Bottom cutout size as % of compartment. Default: 80

FTR_CUTOUT_TYPE.label: Cutout Type
FTR_CUTOUT_TYPE.tooltip: Where cutouts are applied: INTERIOR only, EXTERIOR only, or BOTH

FTR_CUTOUT_DEPTH_MAX.label: Max Cutout Depth
FTR_CUTOUT_DEPTH_MAX.tooltip: Maximum cutout depth in mm (0 = no limit)

FTR_SHEAR.label: Shear
FTR_SHEAR.tooltip: Shear angle [x, y] in degrees — pivots around compartment center

FTR_FILLET_RADIUS.label: Fillet Radius
FTR_FILLET_RADIUS.tooltip: Fillet radius in mm (only for FILLET shape, capped at compartment height)

FTR_PEDESTAL_BASE_B.label: Pedestal Base
FTR_PEDESTAL_BASE_B.tooltip: Add a pedestal push-out base — ideal for tiles/cards in interior compartments

LID_FIT_UNDER_B.label: Fit Under
LID_FIT_UNDER_B.tooltip: Cap-style lid that fits over the box (uncheck for flush lid)

LID_SOLID_B.label: Solid
LID_SOLID_B.tooltip: Solid lid with no pattern cutouts — labels are recessed into the surface

LID_HEIGHT.label: Height
LID_HEIGHT.tooltip: Lid height in mm. Default: 4mm for cap lids, 2mm for inset lids

LID_INSET_B.label: Inset
LID_INSET_B.tooltip: Inset lid that sits inside the box walls (required for stackable boxes)

LID_CUTOUT_SIDES_4B.label: Cutout Sides
LID_CUTOUT_SIDES_4B.tooltip: Finger cutouts in the lid [front, back, left, right] — makes lid usable as a tray

LID_TABS_4B.label: Tabs
LID_TABS_4B.tooltip: Retention tabs on inset lids [front, back, left, right]

LID_LABELS_INVERT_B.label: Invert Labels
LID_LABELS_INVERT_B.tooltip: Raised label text (embossed) instead of recessed (engraved)

LID_SOLID_LABELS_DEPTH.label: Label Depth
LID_SOLID_LABELS_DEPTH.tooltip: Label depth on solid lids in mm

LID_LABELS_BG_THICKNESS.label: Label Background
LID_LABELS_BG_THICKNESS.tooltip: Label background panel thickness in mm

LID_LABELS_BORDER_THICKNESS.label: Label Border
LID_LABELS_BORDER_THICKNESS.tooltip: Label border line thickness in mm

LID_STRIPE_WIDTH.label: Stripe Width
LID_STRIPE_WIDTH.tooltip: Width of stripe lines in the label background pattern

LID_STRIPE_SPACE.label: Stripe Spacing
LID_STRIPE_SPACE.tooltip: Spacing between stripe lines in the label background pattern

LID_PATTERN_RADIUS.label: Pattern Radius
LID_PATTERN_RADIUS.tooltip: Radius of each pattern element (hex, circle, etc.) in the lid mesh

LID_PATTERN_N1.label: Pattern N1
LID_PATTERN_N1.tooltip: Number of sides for the outer pattern shape

LID_PATTERN_N2.label: Pattern N2
LID_PATTERN_N2.tooltip: Number of sides for the inner pattern shape

LID_PATTERN_ANGLE.label: Pattern Angle
LID_PATTERN_ANGLE.tooltip: Rotation angle of the pattern shapes in degrees

LID_PATTERN_ROW_OFFSET.label: Row Offset
LID_PATTERN_ROW_OFFSET.tooltip: Row offset as % — how much each row shifts horizontally

LID_PATTERN_COL_OFFSET.label: Column Offset
LID_PATTERN_COL_OFFSET.tooltip: Column offset as % — how much each column shifts vertically

LID_PATTERN_THICKNESS.label: Pattern Thickness
LID_PATTERN_THICKNESS.tooltip: Wall thickness of pattern shapes in mm

LBL_TEXT.label: Text
LBL_TEXT.tooltip: Label text. Use a string for all compartments, or a 2D array for per-compartment labels.

LBL_IMAGE.label: Image
LBL_IMAGE.tooltip: Path to SVG image file (Warning: slows rendering considerably)

LBL_SIZE.label: Size
LBL_SIZE.tooltip: Font size as a number, or AUTO to fit the available space

LBL_PLACEMENT.label: Placement
LBL_PLACEMENT.tooltip: Where to place the label: surface edges, walls, center (floor), or bottom of box

LBL_FONT.label: Font
LBL_FONT.tooltip: OpenSCAD font specifier, e.g. "Times New Roman:style=Bold Italic"

LBL_DEPTH.label: Depth
LBL_DEPTH.tooltip: How deep the label cuts or embosses in mm

LBL_AUTO_SCALE_FACTOR.label: Auto Scale
LBL_AUTO_SCALE_FACTOR.tooltip: Scale multiplier when using AUTO size (larger = bigger text)

DIV_TAB_CYCLE.label: Tab Cycle
DIV_TAB_CYCLE.tooltip: Number of tab positions before the tab cycles back to the left

DIV_TAB_CYCLE_START.label: Cycle Start
DIV_TAB_CYCLE_START.tooltip: Starting position in the tab cycle (1-based)

DIV_TAB_TEXT.label: Tab Text
DIV_TAB_TEXT.tooltip: Array of strings — one per divider tab

DIV_TAB_TEXT_CHAR_THRESHOLD.label: Char Threshold
DIV_TAB_TEXT_CHAR_THRESHOLD.tooltip: Auto-shrink text when it exceeds this many characters

DIV_FRAME_SIZE_XY.label: Frame Size
DIV_FRAME_SIZE_XY.tooltip: Divider frame dimensions [width, height] in mm (without tab)

DIV_FRAME_TOP.label: Frame Top
DIV_FRAME_TOP.tooltip: Frame top border height in mm

DIV_FRAME_BOTTOM.label: Frame Bottom
DIV_FRAME_BOTTOM.tooltip: Frame bottom border height in mm

DIV_FRAME_COLUMN.label: Frame Column
DIV_FRAME_COLUMN.tooltip: Frame vertical column divider width in mm

DIV_FRAME_NUM_COLUMNS.label: Frame Columns
DIV_FRAME_NUM_COLUMNS.tooltip: Number of vertical columns in frame (-1 = solid, 0 = no columns)

G_PRINT_LID_B.label: Print Lid
G_PRINT_LID_B.tooltip: Print lids (uncheck to render boxes only)

G_PRINT_BOX_B.label: Print Box
G_PRINT_BOX_B.tooltip: Print boxes (uncheck to render lids only)

G_FIT_TEST_B.label: Fit Test
G_FIT_TEST_B.tooltip: Output everything as placeholders for fit testing

G_ISOLATED_PRINT_BOX.label: Isolated Print
G_ISOLATED_PRINT_BOX.tooltip: Render only this named box (leave empty for all boxes)

G_VISUALIZATION_B.label: Visualization
G_VISUALIZATION_B.tooltip: Show boxes in assembled arrangement (preview mode)

G_VALIDATE_KEYS_B.label: Validate Keys
G_VALIDATE_KEYS_B.tooltip: Warn about unknown or malformed keys in data

G_WALL_THICKNESS.label: Wall Thickness
G_WALL_THICKNESS.tooltip: Default wall thickness in mm (can be overridden per-box)

G_DETENT_THICKNESS.label: Detent Thickness
G_DETENT_THICKNESS.tooltip: Thickness of lid/box detent in mm

G_DETENT_DIST_FROM_CORNER.label: Detent from Corner
G_DETENT_DIST_FROM_CORNER.tooltip: Distance from corner to start detent

G_DETENT_MIN_SPACING.label: Detent Min Spacing
G_DETENT_MIN_SPACING.tooltip: Min wall length to add extra detents

G_LID_THICKNESS.label: Lid Thickness
G_LID_THICKNESS.tooltip: Thickness of box lid in mm

G_TOLERANCE.label: Tolerance
G_TOLERANCE.tooltip: Tolerance gap between fitting pieces (lid clearance) in mm

COUNTER_SET.label: Counter Set
COUNTER_SET.tooltip: Counter set — defines one group of counter slots in the tray

COUNTER_SIZE_XYZ.label: Counter Size
COUNTER_SIZE_XYZ.tooltip: Counter dimensions [width, depth, thickness] in mm

ROWS_N.label: Rows
ROWS_N.tooltip: Number of rows for this counter set

COUNTER_SHAPE.label: Shape
COUNTER_SHAPE.tooltip: Counter compartment shape: SHAPE_SQUARE, SHAPE_CIRCLE, SHAPE_TRIANGLE, or SHAPE_HEX

COUNTER_MARGINS_XY.label: Margins
COUNTER_MARGINS_XY.tooltip: Margin around each counter [x, y] in mm

COUNTER_MARGINS_POST_LENGTH_FRACTION_N.label: Post Length Fraction
COUNTER_MARGINS_POST_LENGTH_FRACTION_N.tooltip: Fraction of counter size used for margin post length

COUNTER_HOLE_FRACTION_N.label: Hole Fraction
COUNTER_HOLE_FRACTION_N.tooltip: Fraction of counter size used for finger hole diameter

COUNTER_PEDESTAL_B.label: Pedestal
COUNTER_PEDESTAL_B.tooltip: If checked, counters sit on pedestals for easier removal

G_FRAME_STYLE_N.label: Frame Style
G_FRAME_STYLE_N.tooltip: Frame style (1-4): affects the tray frame appearance

G_MAGNET_DIAMETER_N.label: Magnet Diameter
G_MAGNET_DIAMETER_N.tooltip: Magnet diameter in mm (0 = no magnets)

G_MIN_PADDING_XY.label: Min Padding
G_MIN_PADDING_XY.tooltip: Minimum padding between counter slots [x, y] in mm

g_make_filler.label: Make Filler
g_make_filler.tooltip: Generate filler pieces for empty tray space

g_make_svg.label: Make SVG
g_make_svg.tooltip: Generate SVG output for laser cutting
